message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm asking for $15,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm looking for. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $11,500?
